data.title: Sallie Krawcheck on LinkedIn: Vacation You Versus Regular You
data.meta_description: To celebrate the official start of summer last week, the Ellevest team did a deep dive of the difference between you on a vacation versus you not. And maybeâ€¦
data.text:
Summer is in full swing; vacation ideas are being put into place and good times are around the corner for families across the globe. The one thing that a good summer holiday needs is great planning. And that planning starts with small steps and a foundation. Sort of reminds me of what I do with long term planning with folks all the time. We start with a foundation and go from there. If you have some plans that have been put on the back burner for a while, give me a call and let's talk about them. #FirstCommand #Planning #GetSquaredAway

Planning a summer vacation with a medically fragile loved one requires careful consideration to make sure they enjoy themselves while youâ€™re keeping them safe and comfortable.
